name: Quadblast
description:
Jump into this fast-paced arcade shooter, with only your skills to help you survive. Oh, and 4 FREAKIN’ LASER BEAMS!

Rack up the points as you tilt and swipe your way to the top of the leaderboards. Face off against ever mounting odds with a control system designed for ultimate responsivity, and to clear your view of the screen, putting you in control of the action!

Do you have what it takes to become a Quadmaster?

FEATURES:

* Unlock numerous upgrades that will boost your speed, lasers, shields, and even allow you to manipulate time!
* Honed your skills to the point where things start off too sedate for you? Kick it up a notch with the Jumpstart ability, and leap straight to the action.
* Compete against your friends with Game Center leaderboards and achievements, and know right away when you've beaten their record!
* Got a new highscore, or just beaten a friend’s best? Let them know about it!
* View or upload video replays of your game.
